page.title: 14RURAL ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: ARTS AND CRAFTS CONTINUE TO SURVIVE IN THIS AREA - PROBABLY BECAUSE OF THE INFLUENCE OF THE LOCAL WOMENS INSTITUTE, AS MANY COUNTRY WOMEN ARE MEMBERS. IN ADDITION TO THE LADIES' CULINARY EXPERTISE,THEY ARE FREQUENTLY EXPERT NEEDLEWOMEN IN CROCHET, DRESSMAKING, KNITTING AND EMBROIDERY. THERE ARE ALSO MANY LOCAL LADIES WHO ARE VERY ACCOMPLISHED IN THE ART OF LACEMAKING - A SLOW AND VERY DEMANDING PURSUIT WHICH TAKES A HEAVY TOLL ON THE EYES OVER A PERIOD OF TIME. POPULAR FUND-RAISERS AT LOCAL EVENTS ARE THE MANY HOME-MADE ITEMS WHICH FALL INTO THE CATEGORY OF RURAL CRAFTS - AND TOWN DWELLERS ARE AMONG THE MOST ENTHUSIASTIC CUSTOMERS FOR THESE WARES.RURAL COMMUNITIES SEEM TO PRODUCE MANY QUALITY ARTISTS WHO ARE INCREASINGLY APPRECIATED.
